result.eng: He threatened that he would pull his party out of government.
result.ga: Bhagair sé go dtarraingeodh sé a pháirtí amach as an rialtas
result.orig: Bhagair sé go dtarraingeodh sé a pháirtí amach as an rialtas
result.html: Bhagair sé go dtarraingeodh sé a pháirtí amach as an rialtasHe threatened that he would pull his party out of government.
result.ponchtml: Ḃagair sé go dtarraingeoḋ sé a ṗáirtí amaċ as an rialtasHe threatened that he would pull his party out of government.

result.eng: How will the government deal with the problem of unemployment?
result.ga: Conas a dhéileálfaidh an rialtas le fadhb na dífhostaíochta

result.ponchtml: Conas a ḋéileálfaiḋ an rialtas le faḋb na díḟostaíoċtaHow will the government deal with the problem of unemployment?

result.eng: The government's response to the economic crisis.
result.ga: Freagra an rialtais ar an ghéarchéim eacnamaíochta

result.eng: She was told that she would have to pay €500 to the government.
